original: Upasenasūtra
analyzed: upasena sūtra

original: Wal_2_1 siddham / rājagṛhe nidānam /
analyzed: siddham rājagṛhe nidānam

original: Wal_2_2 tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān upaseno rājagṛhe viharati śītavane śmaśāne sarpaśauṇḍikaprāgbhāre kaliṁkopavicārāntarikāyām /
analyzed: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmān upasenaḥ rājagṛhe viharati śītavane śmaśāne sarpa śauṇḍika prāgbhāre kali kopa vicāra āntarikāyām

original: Wal_2_3 athāyuṣmata upasenasya ekākino rahasigatasya pratisaṁlīnasya āśīviṣaḥ kāye nipatita uggratejā ghoraviṣaḥ parittas tadyathā āṁjanaśalākā
analyzed: atha āyuṣmataḥ upasenasya ekākinaḥ rahasigatasya pratisalīnasya āśīviṣaḥ kāye nipatitaḥ uggra tejāḥ ghora viṣaḥ parittaḥ tat yathā ājana śalākā

original: Wal_2_4 tatrāyuṣmān upaseno bhikṣūn āmaṁtrayati / āśīviṣo me kāye nipatitaḥ tadyathā āṁjanaśalākā /
analyzed: tatra āyuṣmān upasenaḥ bhikṣūn āmatrayati āśīviṣaḥ me kāye nipatitaḥ tat yathā ājana śalākā

original: aṁga tāvan me āyuṣmantaḥ kāyaṁ samaṁtato ’nuparigṛhya bahir abhinirharata mā ihaiva
analyzed: aga tāvat me āyuṣmantaḥ kāya samatataḥ nu parigṛhya bahis abhinirharata mā iha eva

original: viśariṣyati tadyathā busamuṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: viśariṣyati tat yathā busa muṣṭiḥ

original: Wal_2_5 tena khalu samayenāyuṣmāñ śāriputra āyuṣmata upasenasya nātidūre niṣaṇṇo ’bhūd anyataram vṛkṣamūlaṁ niśritya /
analyzed: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ āyuṣmataḥ upasenasya na atidūre niṣaṇṇaḥ bhūt anyataram niśritya

original: Wal_2_6 aśrauṣīd āyuṣmāñ śāriputra āyuṣmata upasenasya vāgvyāhāram / śrutvā ca punar yenāyuṣmān upasenas tenopajagāma / upetyāyuṣmantam upasenam  #
analyzed: aśrauṣīt āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ āyuṣmataḥ upasenasya vāc vyāhāram śrutvā ca punar yena āyuṣmān upasenaḥ tena upajagāma upetya āyuṣmantam upasenam

original: idam avocat /
analyzed: idam avocat

original: Wal_2_7 na khalu vayam āyuṣmata upasenasya paśyāmo mukhasya vā anyathātvam indriyāṇāṁ vā
analyzed: na khalu vayam āyuṣmataḥ upasenasya paśyāmaḥ mukhasya vā anyathātvam indriyāṇām vā

original: nānākaraṇam / atha ca punar āyuṣmān upasena evam āha / āśīviṣo me kāye nipatitaḥ
analyzed: nānākaraṇam atha ca punar āyuṣmān upasenaḥ evam āha āśīviṣaḥ me kāye nipatitaḥ

original: pūrvavad yāvat tadyathā busamuṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: pūrvavat yāvat tat yathā busa muṣṭiḥ

original: Wal_2_8 yasyāyuṣmāñ śariputra evaṁ syāt / ahaṁ cakṣur mama cakṣuḥ / ahaṁ śrottaṁ ghrāṇaṁ
analyzed: yasya āyuṣmān śari putraḥ eva syāt aha cakṣuḥ mama cakṣuḥ aha śrotta ghrāṇa

original: jihvā kāyaḥ / ahaṁ manaḥ / mama manaḥ / ahaṁ rūpaṁ mama rūpam / ahaṁ śabdagandharasaspṛṣṭavyadharmā
analyzed: jihvā kāyaḥ aha manaḥ mama manaḥ aha rūpa mama rūpam aha śabda gandha rasa spṛṣṭavya dharmā

original: mama dharmāḥ / ahaṁ pṛthivīdhātur mama pṛthivīdhātuḥ / aham abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur
analyzed: mama dharmāḥ aha pṛthivī dhātuḥ mama pṛthivī dhātuḥ aham ap dhātuḥ tejaḥ dhātuḥ vāyu dhātuḥ

original: ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātuḥ / ahaṁ rūpaskandho mama rūpaskandhaḥ / ahaṁ vedanāsaṁjñāsaṁskāravijñānaskandho
analyzed: ākāśa dhātuḥ vijñāna dhātuḥ aha rūpa skandhaḥ mama rūpa skandhaḥ aha vedanā sajñā saskāra vijñāna skandhaḥ

original: mama vijñānaskandhaḥ / tasya syād mukhasya vā anyathātvam indriyāṇāṁ vā nānākaraṇam /
analyzed: mama vijñāna skandhaḥ tasya syāt mukhasya vā anyathātvam indriyāṇā vā nānākaraṇam

original: Wal_2_9 mama tu naivaṁ bhavati / ahaṁ cakṣur mama cakṣuḥ / tadyathā ahaṁ vijñānaskandho mama vijñānaskandhaḥ / tasya me kiṁ bhaviṣyati mukhasya  #
analyzed: mama tu na eva bhavati aha cakṣuḥ mama cakṣuḥ tat yathā aha vijñāna skandhaḥ mama vijñāna skandhaḥ tasya me ki bhaviṣyati mukhasya

original: vā anyathātvam indriyāṇāṁ vā nānākaraṇam /
analyzed: vā anyathātvam indriyāṇām vā nānākaraṇam

original: Wal_10 dīragharāttraṁ khalv āyuṣmata upasenasya ahaṁkaramamaṁkarāsmimānābhiniveśānuśayaḥ
analyzed: khalu āyuṣmataḥ upasenasya ahakara mamakara asmimāna abhiniveśa anuśayaḥ

original: prahīṇāḥ parijñātā ucchinnamūlās tālamastakavad anābhavagatikā āyatyām anutpādadharmāṇaḥ /
analyzed: prahīṇāḥ parijñātāḥ ucchinna mūlāḥ tāla mastaka vat anābhavagatikāḥ āyatyām anutpāda dharmāṇaḥ

original: tasya te kiṁ bhaviṣyati mukhasya vā anyathātvam indriyāṇāṁ vā nānākaraṇam /
analyzed: tasya te ki bhaviṣyati mukhasya vā anyathātvam indriyāṇā vā nānākaraṇam

original: Wal_11 athāyuṣmāñ śariputtraḥ āyuṣmata upasenasya kāyaṁ sāmantakenānuparigṛhya bahir abhinirharati /
analyzed: atha āyuṣmān śariputtraḥ āyuṣmataḥ upasenasya kāya sāmantakena anuparigṛhya bahis abhinirharati

original: Wal_12 samanantarābhinirhṛta āyuṣmata upasenasya kāyaḥ śataśo viśirṇas tadyathā busamuṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: samanantara abhinirhṛtaḥ āyuṣmataḥ upasenasya kāyaḥ śataśas viśirṇaḥ tat yathā busa muṣṭiḥ

original: Wal_13 athāyuṣmāñ śāriputro ’syāṁ velāyāṁ gāthā babhāse /
analyzed: atha āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ syāḥ velāyāḥ gāthāḥ babhāse

original: Wal_14 sucīrṇe brahmacarye ’smin mārge caiva subhāvite /
analyzed: su cīrṇe brahmacarye smin mārge ca eva su bhāvite

original: tuṣṭa āyukṣayād bhavati viṣapāttra ivojjhite //
analyzed: tuṣṭaḥ āyu kṣayāt bhavati viṣa pāttre iva ujjhite

original: Wal_15 sucīrṇe brahmacarye ’smin mārge caiva subhāvite /
analyzed: su cīrṇe brahmacarye smin mārge ca eva su bhāvite

original: tuṣṭa āyukṣayād bhavati rogasyāpagame yathā //
analyzed: tuṣṭaḥ āyu kṣayāt bhavati rogasya apagame yathā

original: Wal_16 sucīrṇe brahmacarye ’smin mārge caiva subhāvite /
analyzed: su cīrṇe brahmacarye smin mārge ca eva su bhāvite

original: ādīptād vā gṛhād mukto maraṇānte na śocate //
analyzed: ādīptāt vā gṛhāt muktaḥ maraṇa ante na śocate

original: Wal_17 sucīrṇe brahmacarye ’smin mārge caiva subhāvite /
analyzed: su cīrṇe brahmacarye smin mārge ca eva su bhāvite

original: tṛṣṇakāṣṭhasamaṁ lokaṁ paśyati prajñayā yadā //
analyzed: tṛṣṇa kāṣṭha sama paśyati prajñayā yadā

original: Wal_18 athāyuṣmāñ śāriputra āyuṣmata upasenasya śarīre śāripūjāṁ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṁs tenopajagāma upetya bhagavatpādau śirasā vanditvā ekāṁte  #
analyzed: atha āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ āyuṣmataḥ upasenasya śarīre śāripūjā kṛtvā yena bhagavān tena upajagāma upetya bhagavat pādau śirasā vanditvā ekāte

original: nyaṣīdat /
analyzed: nyaṣīdat

original: Wal_19 ekāṁtaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmāñ śāriputtro bhagavaṁtam idam avocat /
analyzed: ekāta niṣaṇṇaḥ āyuṣmān śāriputtraḥ bhagavatam idam avocat

original: Wal_20 āyuṣmato bhadaṁta upasenasya āśīviṣaḥ kāye nipatita ugratejā ghoraviṣaḥ parittas tadyathāṁ janaśalākā pūrvavad yāvat tasya kāyo viśīrṇas  #
analyzed: āyuṣmataḥ bhadataḥ upasenasya āśīviṣaḥ kāye nipatitaḥ ugra tejāḥ ghora viṣaḥ parittaḥ tat yathā jana śalākā pūrvavat yāvat tasya kāyaḥ viśīrṇaḥ

original: tadyathā busamuṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: tat yathā busa muṣṭiḥ

original: Wal_21 sacec chāriputra upasenasya kulaputtrasya tasmiṁ samaye imā gāthāḥ pratyabhāsyaṁta imāni ca maṁtrapadāni nāsyāśīviṣaḥ kāye ’kramiṣyan  #
analyzed: saced śāriputraḥ upasenasya kula puttrasya tasmin samaye imāḥ gāthāḥ imāni ca matra padāni na asya āśīviṣaḥ kāye kramiṣyan

original: nāsya kāyo viśariṣyat tadyathā busamuṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: na asya kāyaḥ viśariṣyat tat yathā busa muṣṭiḥ

original: Wal_22 yā bhadaṁta katamā gāthāḥ katamāni maṁtrapadāni //
analyzed: yāḥ bhadata katamāḥ gāthāḥ katamāni matra padāni

original: Wal_23 maitrī me dhṛtirāṣṭreṣu maitrī airāvaṇeṣu ca /
analyzed: maitrī me dhṛtirāṣṭreṣu maitrī airāvaṇeṣu ca

original: chibbāputtreṣu me maitrī kaṁbalāśvatareṣu ca //
analyzed: chibbā puttreṣu me maitrī kabala aśvatareṣu ca

original: Wal_24 karkoṭakeṣu me maitrī kṛṣṇagautamakeṣu ca /
analyzed: karkoṭakeṣu me maitrī kṛṣṇagautamakeṣu ca

original: nandopandau ye nāgā teṣu maitrī ca me sadā //
analyzed: nanda upandau ye teṣu maitrī ca me sadā

original: Wal_25 apādakeṣu me maitrī maitrī me dvipadeṣu ca /
analyzed: a pādakeṣu me maitrī maitrī me dvipadeṣu ca

original: catuṣpadeṣu me maitrī maitrī bahupadeṣu ca //
analyzed: catuṣpadeṣu me maitrī maitrī bahu padeṣu ca

original: Wal_26 sarvvanāgeṣu me maitrī ye nāgā udadhiniśritāḥ /
analyzed: sarvva nāgeṣu me maitrī ye nāgāḥ udadhi niśritāḥ

original: sarvvasatveṣu me maitrī ye ttrasāḥ sthāvarāś ca ye //
analyzed: sarvva satveṣu me maitrī ye ttrasāḥ sthāvarāḥ ca ye

original: Wal_27 sukhinaḥ sarvve satvā hi sarvve satvā niramayāḥ /
analyzed: sukhinaḥ sarvve satvāḥ hi sarvve satvāḥ niramayāḥ

original: sarvve bhadrāṇi paśyaṁtu mā caiśāṁ pāpam āgamat //
analyzed: sarvve bhadrāṇi paśyatu mā ca aiśā pāpam āgamat

original: Wal_28 sarpaśauṇḍikaprāgbhāre nityaṁ viharato mama /
analyzed: sarpa śauṇḍika prāgbhāre viharataḥ mama

original: āśīviṣo ghoraviṣo jīvitam uparundhati //
analyzed: āśīviṣaḥ ghora viṣaḥ jīvitam uparundhati

original: Wal_29 yena me satyavākyena śāstā lokeṣv anuttaraḥ /
analyzed: yena me satya vākyena śāstā lokeṣu anuttaraḥ

original: tena me satyavākyena mā me kāye viṣaṁ kramet //
analyzed: tena me satya vākyena mā me kāye viṣa kramet

original: Wal_30 rāgo dveṣaś ca mohaś ca ete loke viṣattrayam /
analyzed: rāgaḥ dveṣaḥ ca mohaḥ ca ete loke viṣat trayam

original: nirvviṣo bhagavān buddhaḥ satyadharmahataṁ viṣam //
analyzed: nirvviṣaḥ bhagavān buddhaḥ satya dharma hata viṣam

original: Wal_31 hataṁ viṣaṁ ghoraviṣaṁ kṛto rakṣāparikaraḥ /
analyzed: hata viṣa ghora viṣa kṛtaḥ rakṣā parikaraḥ

original: sarvve hataviṣa biddhās tad uraga hataṁ viṣam //
analyzed: sarvve hata viṣa biddhāḥ tat uraga hata viṣam

original: Wal_32 tatremāni mantrapadāni bhavaṁti tadyathā / otuṁbile / tuṁbile / tuṁbe / pratuṁbe / naṭṭe / sunaṭṭe / kevaṭṭe / munaye / samaye / datte  #
analyzed: tatra imāni mantra padāni bhavati tat yathā otubile tubile tube pratube naṭṭe sunaṭṭe kevaṭṭe munaye samaye datte

original: / nīlakeśe / vālakupe / ole / oṅko / svāhā //
analyzed: nīla keśe vā alakupe ole oṅko svāhā

original: Wal_33 sacec chāriputtra upasenasya kulaputrasya tasmiṁ samaye imā gāthāḥ pratyabhāyaṁta imāni ca maṁtrapadāni nāsyāśīviṣaṁ kāye ’kramiṣyat  #
analyzed: saced śāriputtraḥ upasenasya kula putrasya tasmin samaye imāḥ gāthāḥ imāni ca matra padāni na asya āśīviṣa kāye kramiṣyat

original: / nāsya kāyo vyaśariṣyat tadyathā busamuṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: na asya kāyaḥ vyaśariṣyat tat yathā busa muṣṭiḥ

original: Wal_34 tat kuta etad bhadaṁta labhyam āyuṣmata upasenena yat tasmiṁ samaye aśrutapūrvvā gāthāḥ pratibhāṣyaṁte aśrutapūrvvāṇi vā maṁtrapadāni  #
analyzed: tat kutas etat bhadata labhyam āyuṣmataḥ upasenena yat tasmin samaye aśruta pūrvāḥ gāthāḥ pratibhāṣyate aśruta pūrvāṇi vā matra padāni

original: tadyathā etarhi bhagavataḥ /
analyzed: tat yathā etarhi bhagavataḥ

original: Wal_35 athāyuṣmāñ śāriputtro bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavatpādau śirasā bhagavato ’ntikāt prakrāṁtaḥ //
analyzed: atha āyuṣmān śāriputtraḥ bhagavataḥ bhāṣitam abhinandya anumodya bhagavat pādau śirasā bhagavataḥ ntikāt prakrātaḥ
